name: shapeshift
description: - Introducing ShapeShift, the easiest and most efficient way to keep track of your daily calorie and macro intake. With our app, you can easily log your meals, snacks, and drinks to get a clear picture of your daily calorie consumption. The app also allows you to set personalized goals, including weight loss, maintenance, or gain, and tracks your progress over time. With intuitive and user-friendly features, ShapeShift makes it easy to manage your nutrition and achieve your goals.
